cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Veterans’ Affairs on April 6, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 7375, To direct the Secretary of VA to update the payment system of the Department of VA to allow for EFT of educational assistance, administered by the Secretary, to a foreign institution of higher education

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 59 (Monday, April 4, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. SHERRILL:
H.R. 7375.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
This bill is enacted pursuant to the power granted to
Congress under Article I, Section 8, Clause 16 of the United
States Constitution.
[Page H4153]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

title: To direct the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to update the payment system of the Department of Veterans Affairs to allow for electronic fund transfer of educational assistance, administered by the Secretary, to a foreign institution of higher education.
